monsters.name: Creeper
monsters.info: The creeper is a hostile mob that, when close to the player, will explode causing damage depending on how far the player is from the explosion.

monsters.name: Zombie
stats: Drops : XP, Rotten Flesh(COMMON), Iron Ingot(RARE)
monsters.info: The Zombie is a hostile mob that will burn in daylight. When close to a player it will attack causing damage of 2.5 to 4.5 hearts.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.info: The Skeleton is a hostile mob that when within a 16 block radius of the player will start chasing and shooting at the with their bow.
